question.text:
Standard entropies of $\mathrm{X}_2, \mathrm{Y}_2$ and $\mathrm{XY}_3$ are 60,40 and $50 \mathrm{~J} \mathrm{~K} \mathrm{~K}^{-1} \mathrm{~mol}^{-1}$ respectively. For the reaction
$\frac{1}{2} \mathrm{X}_2+\frac{3}{2} \mathrm{Y}_2 \rightleftharpoons \mathrm{XY}_3 ; \Delta \mathrm{H}=-30 \mathrm{~kJ}$, to be at
equilibrium, the temperature should be
